name: Retro Repair Redux
description:
A small game made for Retro Jam 2021. We opted to go for a PSX style and did our best to recreate it through the use of dsoft20's downloadable shaders which we tweaked. Along with following old style modelling and texture practices for the PSX console. 

Due to being busy we never quite got to develop it how we wanted and missed the deadline for Retro Jam by a couple of hours.

The game was developed by a team of 3:

Jack Hill - Modelling/Artist/Gameplay Designer

James Johnson - Programming/Gameplay Designer

James Nethercott - Level Creation/Gameplay Designer
